career.title: Sandwich training as 5G software engineer at Nokia
career.description: I'm currently in an Engineer School in sandwich training at ISEP major in Software Engineer. I was able to carry out many projects during this 3 years. Both in computer science and electronics, I was able to complete website projects with basic technologies (html/css/js/php) but also using React, both in Javascript and TypeScript. I work at Nokia as a 5G Software Engineer on the development of the 5G. My work within the team consists in developing and implementing new features. One of the major feature i've worked on, is the connection of a mobile to an antenna. I mainly work on the management of the messages/exchanges between the various parts of the software to then, be able to exchange data between the mobile and the network.

career.title: Internship in an Electronic design office at InES
career.description: 12 weeks internship for my University Technical Degree validation, it goes really well and have been extended to the end of summer vacation.<newline/> During this internship, I was able to deepen my knowledge in <bold>C/C++ development</bold>, I've been able to work from the very start to the end of this project, it means that I was the one who created the PCB (Printed Circuit Board), I choose all the different components and solder them on the board. This internship was highly formative

career.title: IUT GEII Angers
career.description: At the end of these 2 years in Angers, I successfully passed my University Technology Degree major in computer science.<newline/> Throughout theses years of school, I learnt a lot in many fields but especially in electronics and computer science

career.title: Tennis coach
career.description: During my last year of High-School, in parallel with school lessons, I passed a tennis coach training. This formation allows me to give training as a volunteer, giving me the opportunity to help my club as well as my coach to do lessons with youth.<newline/> So, for 2 years, I've been able to train young people and help my trainer during events organized by the club (like tournament for example). These young people had between 8 and 15 years old and were licensee at TCA (Tennis Club Authion)

career.title: Chevrollier High School
career.description: High-School Degree, major in computer science with honors
